title: A U Zhi Kaixin Tongnian
synopsis: The protagonist U is a kid next door, he is clever, clever, mischievous, has endless spooky ideas, countless funny stories, and brings constant laughter. U's practical ability is far better than the ability to learn classroom knowledge. Ah U is caring, likes to help others, and at the same time loves to be public, like to show the limelight, often kindly do bad things, often embarrassed. U has a group of super partner groups. In the study and family life, U and his friends have had countless funny stories. In these things, U showed everyone his cleverness and nonsensicalness. In the funny story, they gained growth and shared the joy of growth!(translated form douban)
